### Inline math with braces

$\sum_{e \in \E} \beta_{e,i} \cdot \phi_e(t) \leq s_i \big( \rho_i(t) \big)$

$d_e(\rho_e(t))$

$\bar \rho_e = + \infty$

$e \in \mathcal{S}$

---

$d_e(\rho_e(t))$

$\bar \rho_e = + \infty$
